instructions:
Combine the above in a 2 quart saucepan and simmer for 30 minutes. Makes about 2 1/2 cups. Store in
refrigerator indefinitely in a glass jar with a plastic lid.
Marinate chicken, pork or beef, in refrigerator for at least 3 hours or overnight. Bake at 350 F until done
*(see "Broiled Chicken Leg Quarters")*, then paint with marinade and broil about 2 minutes or until golden
brown on each side at 6 inches from element before serving.
name: Sara Lee's Marinade And Barbecue Sauce
